question: Does the teacher demonstrate mastery of the course content?
Does the teacher use effective teaching methods?
Does the teacher provide constructive feedback to students?
Does the teacher foster an inclusive and respectful classroom environment?
Is the teacher available to help students outside of class hours?
Does the teacher use appropriate teaching resources to facilitate learning?
Does the teacher motivate students to actively participate in class?
Does the teacher assess fairly and consistently?
Does the teacher demonstrate genuine commitment to student academic progress?
Does the teacher stay updated with trends and advancements in their field?
